info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 3:15AM CST until November 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT: Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 2 inches...with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE: The higher terrain of the Ouachitas and Ozarks...and northern and north central Arkansas. * WHEN: From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS: Hazardous travel conditions may develop...especially on elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses...and areas that see the heaviest wintry weather.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving.
